Luxury Appliance Repair in Beverly Hills

White-Glove Service for Iconic Estates and Designer Kitchens

Beverly Hills isn’t just a zip code—it’s a symbol of excellence. From the mansions of Trousdale Estates to the architectural gems of The Flats, luxury living defines the standard. In homes where performance meets prestige, appliances aren’t just tools—they’re statements. And when they need expert care, they deserve nothing less than perfection.

At Luxury Appliance Repair by Zaricci, we provide discreet, same-day repair for Beverly Hills’ most elite residences. Whether you own a Sub-Zero fridge, a La Cornue range, or a Miele dishwasher, our factory-trained technicians are equipped to service them with precision and care.

🔧 Why Beverly Hills Chooses ZARICCI

  • ✅ Certified in Premium Brands
    From Wolf and Gaggenau to Miele and Thermador, our specialists are trained in the nuances of each luxury appliance brand—ensuring factory-level service every time.
  • ✅ Same-Day and Emergency Service
    We offer priority scheduling for clients in Beverly Hills, including appointments for high-profile and time-sensitive situations.
  • ✅ OEM Parts & Lasting Repairs
    We use only genuine parts to maintain performance, aesthetics, and manufacturer warranty compliance.
  • ✅ White-Glove Protocol
    Our team wears shoe covers, uses padded mats, and performs a spotless clean-up—so your home stays pristine while your appliance is restored.

🛠️ Luxury Appliances We Service

❄️ Refrigerators & Freezers

  • Sub-Zero, Miele, Thermador, Viking
  • Cooling inconsistencies and compressor issues
  • Ice maker and water system repairs
  • Noise, leaks, or panel malfunctions

🔥 Ovens, Ranges & Cooktops

  • La Cornue, Wolf, Gaggenau, Bertazzoni
  • Gas or induction burner issues
  • Temperature calibration and uneven cooking
  • Steam oven or smart display failures

🚿 Dishwashers

  • Miele, Bosch, Smeg, Cove
  • Poor cleaning or draining
  • Leak detection and error codes
  • Cycle failures and UI problems

🧺 Washers & Dryers

  • LG Signature, Miele, Fisher & Paykel
  • Drum not turning or draining
  • Overheating or no heat
  • Smart sensor and interface diagnostics

☕ Built-In Specialty Appliances

  • Warming drawers, espresso machines, wine coolers
  • Motor, pump, and sensor replacements
  • Connectivity and touch screen fixes
  • Temperature or steam system errors

👨‍🔧 Service Experience Tailored for Beverly Hills

  1. Step 1: Book Your Visit
    Call or schedule online. We confirm availability based on your needs and property access.
  2. Step 2: On-Time Diagnosis
    Your technician arrives in uniform, ready to assess and explain every detail of the issue.
  3. Step 3: Transparent Quote
    Receive a detailed estimate that includes parts, labor, and repair timeline—no surprises.
  4. Step 4: Expert Repairs
    We complete the repair using OEM parts and precision tools, then test and verify all functions.
  5. Step 5: Clean Exit & Warranty
    Your appliance is fully restored, the workspace spotless, and your service backed by warranty.
